thread.section_title: Nebraska Furniture Mart Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nebraska Furniture Mart | nfm.com | 19 of 465
thread.title: JULIE I.
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by JULIE I.

author: JULIE I.
title: JULIE I.
text: I have had a lot of bad luck with NFM but mainly their service. They actually laid the wrong carpet in my house and when I told them the offered me a $125 gift certificate which I never received. However, it is hard not to shop there since I live in Kansas City.
